SEARCH
Package io.github.elimelt.pmqueue

Interface MessageQueue

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable
All Known Implementing Classes:
PersistentMessageQueue
public interface MessageQueue extends AutoCloseable
Interface for message queues. Implementations of this interface are responsible for storing and retrieving messages. This interface is thread-safe. Example usage: 

 MessageQueue queue = new PersistentMessageQueue(
         new QueueConfig.Builder()
                 .filePath(filePath)
                 .build());
 queue.offer(new Message("Hello, World!".getBytes(), 1));
 Message message = queue.poll();

  • Method Details

    • offer

      boolean offer(Message message) throws IOException
      Stores a message in the queue.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to store
      Returns:
      true if the message was stored, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • poll

      Message poll() throws IOException
      Retrieves a message from the queue.
      Returns:
      the message retrieved from the queue
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • isEmpty

      boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the queue is empty.
      Returns:
